column4: Well this time I have a question, I am using Ubuntu 8.04 LTS alongside with Windows XP, now can I change it to totall ubuntu without any data loss?
ï»¿I am using Ubuntu 8.04 LTS alongside with Windows XP, now can I change it to totall ubuntu without any data loss?
you could simply delete the xp partition and reformat it for ext3 to use as a data drive

the other method would be to use clonezilla or partimage to save your partitions in ubuntu.. redo the entire harddrive and then restore the saved partitions one at a time.. /home being last so you can then use gparted to make it take the remaining part of the drive.
